most_active_tickets.title: Discord link provided is invalid in Pieces OS
Discord link provided is invalid on the website
Sublime Text plugin icon is bogus

common_issues.title: Invalid Discord Link and Pieces Desktop Freezes
common_issues.description: Two distinct issues reported: 1. Pieces Desktop application freezes after a period of inactivity, especially after interacting with a chat. The freezing issue started after latest update on May 22nd.  2. Invalid Discord invite links are present on Pieces OS, the Pieces website, and the support page. Users suggest creating a non-expiring link as a solution.

related_issues.title: Pieces Desktop freezes after inactivity
related_issues.text:
Pieces Desktop freezes after inactivity
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Pieces OS - 11.4.1
Pieces Desktop - 4.1.3

Pieces desktop randomly freezes after a period of inactivity. I would interact with it in a chat, go back to working in another app and after a while go back to Desktop to find it had frozen. Restart of Pieces Desktop is needed. Note that this problem is very frequent since latest update on May 22nd, but not systematic. I had also noticed this kind of behavior before the updated but put it on the count of my Hardware, Intel i5, 16Gbram Asus Vivobook, but I think I can dismiss this theory.

Where it gets tricky is that this behavior seems to only happen if I had, prior to returning to Pieces Desktop, interacted with a chat. In cases where I simply had started Desktop, worked on something else and gone back to Desktop, it would keep working properly.

Noteworthy: LTM is enabled by default for all chats. Default LLM: Claude 3.7 Sonnet.

Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Discord link provided is invalid in Pieces OS
related_issues.text:
Discord link provided is invalid in Pieces OS
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Pieces OS app offers the following Discord invite link: <https://discord.gg/ubn8JFAXQ7>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/894385e1-db70-49fc-8f48-f5abafadeac0)

The above Discord invite link is invalid. You should create one without an expiration date and replace it.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Discord link provided is invalid on the website
related_issues.text:
Discord link provided is invalid on the website
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Marketing Site (pieces.app)

### Operating System / Platform

Web

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

The main Pieces website [page](<https://pieces.app>) offers the following Discord invite link: <https://discord.gg/getpieces>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/106f7b8e-0f74-4efa-a6ec-9cfe48133198)

The support [page](<https://docs.pieces.app/products/support>) of Pieces documentation website offers the following Discord invite link: <https://discord.com/invite/getpieces>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/87064aff-9a18-420f-bb9f-a86e358e3dea)

Both of the above Discord invite links are invalid. You should create one without an expiration date and replace all those.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Invalid Links and Icons Reported Across Pieces OS and Website
common_issues.description: Multiple reports indicate broken Discord invite links on the Pieces OS app, main website, and documentation, alongside an incorrect icon for the Sublime Text plugin in the Pieces OS settings.  Users suggest creating non-expiring Discord links and using the correct Sublime Text icon to resolve these issues.

related_issues.title: Sublime Text plugin icon is bogus
related_issues.text:
Sublime Text plugin icon is bogus
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

The Connected Applications menu in Settings uses Pieces icon for Sublime Plugin.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6a6d4db1-3767-43cf-a15a-d16a88a0e9a2)

It should be using the Sublime Text 4 icon, since that is what you have published the plugin for.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Prioritize resolving the Pieces Desktop freezing issue (Issue #719) due to its high activity level and impact on user experience.
Address the invalid Discord link issue across Pieces OS, website, and documentation (Issues #724, #723) to ensure users can access community support.
Correct the Sublime Text plugin icon in Pieces OS settings (Issue #722) to maintain a consistent and professional appearance.
Investigate the root cause of the Desktop application freezing, potentially related to the May 22nd update.
Create a permanent Discord invite link to replace all expiring links.
Update the Sublime Text plugin icon with the correct version.
Proactively monitor support channels for new reports related to these issues.
Communicate the resolution of these issues to affected users through appropriate channels (e.g., release notes, support updates).
